snippet.title: [Crypto Ball Z] Official Trailer #1 : Emergency Call-Up!
snippet.description:
🚨 Calling all Heroes! 🚨
Aliens are coming to attack Earth! It’s an emergency! 👾😱
Protect Earth with your fellow Heroes at Crypto Ball Z on WEMIX. 👊
You can meet Crypto Ball Z on WEMIX on April of 2022.

Crypto Ball Z on WEMIX is a blockchain game that is Play& Earn.
It is an easy and fun game that you can enjoy in idle RPG style.
You can obtain Herostones through game play and
use the Herostones to exchange them for the utility token, HERCO.
Mint NFT Commanders that have various utility buffs like mining efficiency
to exchange even more HERCO!

There will be 3 massive AirDrop events at the official homepage
and various events for the community.
Follow us and get information about the game and ongoing events.

🔥🔥 Crypto Ball Z : Official Links 🔥🔥

🔎 Official Website: https://cbz.joycity.com
🐦 Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayCryptoBallZ
💬 Official Discord: https://discord.gg/BDsGEya8C9

👇👇 Pre-registration Ongoing 👇👇
🎮 Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.joycity.cryptoball
🎮 App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1613296694
